## PluginLifecycle interface

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Lifecycle hooks for plugins that need initialization or cleanup.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface PluginLifecycle 
```

## Remarks

These are optional and only implemented by plugins that need them. Most plugins can rely on the factory pattern for initialization.
